storyInfo: The Doctor and Amiya successfully evacuate the ship, which becomes encased in Originium. Mon3tr awakens one month later, but Kal'tsit is no longer by her side.

attributes.content: This is a tough one.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: It's analyzing our combat styles and nullifying our attacks.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We've tried to adapt our tactics many timesâ€”
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Working in conjunction with Logos, Ascalon, and Misery's attacks have quickly destroyed the mimic machine's legs.
Keep it going. We must learn from each attack and be creative tooâ€”
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: The mimic machine has already fell countless times under the team's coordinated attacks, but each time it stands back up.
Look out! It's charging up again.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It keeps repairing itself with Originium.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: We can't let it wear us down.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: We need to destroy that rhombus eye.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I have just the arrow for the job.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Two arrows leave Stormeye's bow as the words leave his mouth.
One breaks the mimic machine's shield, but the other is stopped just before it reaches the rhombus-shaped eye...
The mimic machine has finished charging. Bright red light bursts outâ€”
Then Rosmontis's Arts force the arrow into the eye of the mimic machine.
Do you hurt?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Kaboom.
Rosmontis's Arts block the eye of terror at the exact moment of its outburst, sending overflowing energy into every direction in the Abyss.
The spinning bone pen floats on top of Mechanist's head, shielding him from the rampant energy.
Thanks, Logos. Good thing you guys distracted the thing.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: External attacks are ineffective. We're counting on you to find a way through from inside.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: How are we doing, Mechanist?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: After talking to Closure, we're certain that this is a special Sarcophagus.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It's not just a hibernation device; it's also what truly stores PRTS's data and supplies it with power.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The backdoor Dr. Kal'tsit left us will allow me to connect directly to PRTS's core server.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I'll destroy all the data once I've downloaded PRTS's core data.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Is this the only way to put that big guy to rest?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: How long do you need?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Mechanist glances at his equipment.
Two-hundred forty seconds!
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: We'll buy the time for you.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The sound of the bone whistle echoes in the Abyss. Logos returns to the elite operators' ranks.
The mimic machine once again stands up before them.
Dr. {@nickname} trusts you implicitly. Even with a fractured memoryâ€”
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname} believes you are hope.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.options: Don't let her distract you, Amiya!;We just need to buy a little more time for the others...

attributes.content: You should get ready to retreatâ€”
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There is no way out for Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: We will inevitably end up on the same path, our subjective sentiments notwithstanding.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You and I need not be in opposition, Amiya. I can make your wish come true.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You always trusted me.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Countless eyes look at you from the crystals. Priestess's eyes.
You made the same promise to me. We can find the answer to the ultimate question together.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Time is short, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: I don't need to lie to you.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: This humanitarianism that you think you're advocating simply serves to extend the suffering of Terrans before the inevitable fall of Terra.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Any questions that you still have, I can answer them.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: She's getting weaker, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Most of the operators have evacuated. Maybe, maybe...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I want to tryâ€”
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You want to kill me?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Is this what you want too... Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: 'Priestess'.
There are still so many secrets within her that you want to find out, about yourself, about Kal'tsit, about Originium, about that impending threat...
But you know that where she stands inevitably makes her the enemy of all Terra.
You missed your chance.
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: Stay, Dr. {@nickname}â€”
attributes.name: Priestess

attributes.content: You could hardly imagine the ordeal that Amiya has gone through. She is already well past her limit.
All the threads shatter, and Originium once again closes in upon you.
You try to escape the crystals, carrying Amiya in your arms, but the rampant growth of Originium has sealed the pathâ€”
Made it in time.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Mechanist and Closure have successfully retrieved the core data of PRTS.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: We will cover your retreat.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: Now. Go!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Wait... there's one more thing!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: With what little strength she has left, Amiya conjures a few strands of threads, and pulls the cocoon that was Mon3tr into her arms.
I need your help, Touch!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: These patients were transferred from intensive care. We don't have enough emergency equipment.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I need you to stabilize their conditions first.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Try to gather all the wounded here, and leave the rest to me.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Casualty report?
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Things are still very much in flux. We don't have a hard figure.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Current injury estimates are thirty-one serious, one hundred seventy-three minor. No deaths yet.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: We were able to complete the evacuation ahead of schedule, thanks to the safe zone created by Logos and Mechanist, and the help that you and Pith provided.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: ...One dead. A patient.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'll report in detail to the Doctor and Kalâ€”
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: She stops in mid-sentence.
They have all been avoiding that name.
The one who had always tended to the wounded after each operation.
Kal'tsit.
Help the others establish the isolation zone. We need to keep an eye on the ship to make sure no enemies get out.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: ...Roger.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Warfarinâ€”
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: I'm already doing my best to stay focused, Touch.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Now is not the time.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: What's the situation with Dr. {@nickname} and Amiya?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: We all need some time to process what happened.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: We're at the isolation zone outside the ship. It's safe enough for now.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Is Amiya okay?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Rhodes Islandâ€”
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: That ship which you once called home is now completely encased in a massive Originium crystal.
The wind blows over it, blurring its outline with sand and dust. You know that you have lost Rhodes Island.
You hold Amiya in your arms. She is unconscious, but still holding that crystalline cocoon in her own arms.
Doctor. Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.options: Our greatest threat at present still lies within.
We must prepare ourselves before we confront her again.
I'm not sure what this name truly stands for.
But I will not forgive her.

attributes.content: What... happened to Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The others who escaped the Originium-blockaded area begin to gather.
Yet no one feels relieved, despite the successful evacuation.
Ascalon's question weighs heavily on everyone's hearts.
No one could have seen this comingâ€”
You feel dazed as you look at the black crystal that an unconscious Amiya still clings desperately to.
What next?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: So... We've lost it?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: No. Rhodes Island is never lost.
All of you are here. Always have been.

attributes.content: Can you hear me, Doctor? This is Vina.
I heard about Rhodes Island. I'm very sorry.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: The nomadic plate that Dr. Kal'tsit purchased near Butchart is nearing completion.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I'll be coming to visit soon. Let me know if you need anything.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Take care, you and Amiya...
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: <p=1>New Rhodes Island under construction, Butchart, on the Victorian border</><p=2>One month later</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Midnight asked me to bring this wine back from Siracusa, Popukar.
attributes.name: Reserve Guard Operator

attributes.content: He said it was a... Brunello specialty. I'm not a wine expert, though. Is he getting better?
attributes.name: Reserve Guard Operator

attributes.content: He's still locked up in Medical. Dr. Warfarin grounded him.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: He got hurt dealing with those weird things coming out of the ship, which made Dr. Warfarin really nervous.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I'll give these to Midnight.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Uh... what exactly happened?
attributes.name: Reserve Guard Operator

attributes.content: I heard a bunch of versions. Some say the ship came alive and turned into a monster...
attributes.name: Reserve Guard Operator

attributes.content: Some say they saw friends and family they thought were dead... then our ship was gone, just like thatâ€”
attributes.name: Reserve Guard Operator

attributes.content: Well, I'm not too sure either...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: It all happened so fast. I was listening to Raidian and Dr. Kal'tsitâ€”
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit.
Her absence will take some getting used to.
Looks like we can complete the assembly earlier than scheduled.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The main connectors of this nomadic plate had already been modified to fit our equipment. The hardest part was already taken care of.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The construction has been going much quicker than expected, thanks to all the operators who provided help.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Logos's incantations saved us a lot of effort moving stuff, and Raidian saved a lot of time by checking the circuits for us.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Angelina even came back to help us do the heavy lifting!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: All that stuff laid out on deck in an orderly manner in the blink of an eyeâ€”sorry, I'm getting ahead of myself.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: It's fine. We're all excited to hear that things are going smoothly.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: But I guess you're here for something else. Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Well, yes.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Some of the pipes are so narrow that even these guys couldn't get them checked.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: (Comes out from behind the engineer looking frustrated)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: Has Closure fixed these already?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: (Lowers head in shame)
attributes.name: 'Beepy'

attributes.content: What happened on the ship wasn't your fault, little fella.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: We need to think of a wayâ€”
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: The Doctor said I'm needed here.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: â€”Ray?!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I was wondering why Closure rushed me over here, until I overheard your conversation.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: If you need to check the pipes...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: This little runt oughta come in useful.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: (Slowly stretches its backfin)
attributes.name: Sandbeast

attributes.content: Thank you for the detailed report on the incident, Closure.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: No worries. It's just part of the deal.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yes, I understand. I'll report back to Consuls Clementia and Gladiia and communicate your warning.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: As for the name of the individualâ€”
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: 'Priestess'.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We will reference our own databanks.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: If the name has also appeared in any records of Ã†gir, then the threat you encountered was no coincidence.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I'll let you know about the results as soon as possible. We will also review the Joint Marine Corps deployment of the other consuls.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Once you are ready, we will deliver the necessary equipment, including medical facilities and Catastrophe detection systems.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You're growing into your position, Closure.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Oh, please, spare me.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I would much rather be dealing with machines.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I didn't expect Kal'tsit's job to be this hard...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Are you getting ready to leave?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No time to waste.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Babel must be informed about the details of this incident. Kazdel will check the status of Amnannam on our behalf.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Remember to tell WiÅ¡'adel that the Doctor recommends exercising maximum caution in reviewing the use of that piece of Originium.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Don't worry, the Doctor already hammered the point in. I'll be going, then.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: You're not saying goodbye to the others?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: They've got plenty to do as things stand.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: There's just one thing. About what happened to Dr. Kal'tsit... should we tell Babel?
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Tell WiÅ¡'adel first. She'll want to know.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Let her decide whether to tell the others. I trust her on this.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Tracking you down wasn't easy, Closure. What's going on with the thing that I asked?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: We got Nuova Volsinii's response. The new batch of medical equipment will be shipped in through their port.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The Engineering Department is expecting to complete the construction of the medical lab that you requested in three days.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Good. The medical center should be ready to accept patients, in that case.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Kal'tsit bought this plate a long time ago. It's much bigger than the old Rhodes Island, and it feels much more like an 'island'.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But it's going to take some time for things to go back to the way they were before.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Don't worry. I've made things modular from the get-go this time, which should make future upgrades much easier.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: One more thingâ€”
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: About her office...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Just rebuild it the way it was. Medical will maintain it.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You know, this really is going to take some getting used to.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'll help the Doctor and Amiya with the administrative stuff as much as I can while she's gone.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I don't want to disappoint her.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'll help with things in Medical.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Did the Doctor and Amiya talk to you about recovering the other modules?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Of course. They're very energetic about it. Everything is progressing smoothly.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But it will take time to fully rebuild Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Retrieving the original equipment, building supply channels, restoring communications with local branches, external PR, debriefing returning operatorsâ€”
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The list of things that need to be done just goes on and on.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Which reminds me... about that patient, Chloe...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I've sent someone to the Londinium office to locate her family.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The paper that Chloe and I were co-authoring is almost complete. It will be submitted to all the major medical journals on Terra.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Her sacrifice has helped achieve a true breakthrough in the research of Originium's mutative properties, and the resulting new symptoms of Oripathy.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I must bring this to the attention of more professionals, and make sure that her memory lives on in the minds of more people...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Yes, we couldn't have done it without her.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure rubs her eyes.
Overwork is bad for you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Yeah, the Doctor told me not to push myself too far. But...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Trying to paralyze yourself with work may do the job for a while, but you'll eventually end up harming yourself.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Doctor's advice.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: ...All of Rhodes Island is my responsibility now.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Besides, Kal'tsit had even more on her plate.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Then come to Medical one of these days. I'll get you checked up.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Your blood doesn't even smell of machine oil these days. HR is telling me to keep a close eye on you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Okay... Thanks...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Are the Doctor and Amiya still observing 'Mon3tr' in that forest of yours?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I still think it should be done on the ship. I can provide supportâ€”
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This new Rhodes Island can't afford risks.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You think that Priestess may have tampered with what Kal'tsit left behind?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: No one knows.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: <p=1>Uninhabited area near the ship</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: The rain seems to be getting heavier.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You prop up your coat, shielding Amiya from the sudden shower.
The edge of Amiya's skirt is already all wet, but she does not seem concerned.
She is fully focused on the grass field a short distance away.
Wrapped in Kal'tsit's clothing, the black crystal emanates a dark, flowing green light.
It is rather inconspicuous in the dark and wet surroundings.
The light is appearing more and more frequently in recent days.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: There are no apparent changes in the surrounding Originium.
Maybe Mon3tr has not been affected by Priestess.

attributes.content: You wait and watch, fighting to suppress your hope for a miracle.
For the past month, Amiya has accompanied you on your regular trips to monitor the status of the crystal.
You all needed some time to process what happened.
And you cannot help but hope that the next time you come...
That she will be waiting here for you.
Doctor! Look!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Complex veins meander across the hard surface of the dark-green crystal. It sinks into the ground, then a highly regular shard begins growing, spreading into numerous branchesâ€”
The branches continue to grow until they come to a halt at some point, as though someone had cut off its end with scissors.
In this lush forest, the green crystal on the grass seems to become one with the land, as though it was always there.
That's not quite what Theresa witnessed...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The crystal does not stop growing. The branches increase in number, expanding like the verdant crown of a tree, and the veins grow ever more complex and varied.
Can you tell what those veins represent?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: They're all interconnected in a fluid cycle.
It's like a particular way of storing data.

attributes.content: Storing data?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Kal'tsit's life.
The myriad branches once again merge together, forming a massive cocoon.
All possibilities collapse into one reality.
The symbiont that had been by Kal'tsit's side ever since she awoke will continue to carry her hope, even after she is gone.
It is both a burden and a gift.
Besides, she never had a choice. This was a power that she was born withâ€”
You hear an unfamiliar voice.
...Kal'tsit?
The rain caresses her palms.
An everyday natural phenomenon, so alien to her sensations.
She smells the grass, touches the cold rain... she instinctively puts on the clothes in her hands.
Kal'tsit's clothes.
Kal'tsit...?
She calls Kal'tsit's name in uncertainty. Kal'tsit had always been by her side. She had never been alone before.
No new symbiont has emerged to watch over her, only the two of you in the distance.
She looks up blankly at the sky, trying to process all the memories she possesses, all the memories that belong to AMa-10...
The memories that belong to Kal'tsit.
She recalls her last memory.
On that familiar deck, she fought side-by-side with Kal'tsit against Priestessâ€”
...You gave me freedom.
I can see your memories, all of them...
But I can't sense your presence anymore.
Kal'tsit. Your name... a name that I loved so muchâ€”
But it belongs only to you.
My name is Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You gave me this name.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: These clothes... did Closure prepare them for me?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Hmm. Not quite a perfect fit.)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Why are you looking at me like that, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You mime out the shape of the Mon3tr that you know, much larger than the figure in front of you.
It's me, Doctor.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: What? No, I don't think so.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Do you remember what happened?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes. I faced Priestess together with Kal'tsit, my maker...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Then I lost her.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You and Amiya fall silent.
This is not the outcome you expected, though it is undoubtedly a miracle.
Where are we?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: New Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: We lost the old one in the chaos... Priestess has sealed it in Originium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Hmâ€”that's Priestess's doing?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Doctor... does Mon3tr feel a little... weird?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (It's likeâ€”)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: (Like she's getting used to her new body.)

attributes.content: (I don't sense anything abnormal with her emotions.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What happened to Priestess?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: We're not sure. Rhodes Island is completely encased in Originium, making it nearly impossible to penetrate.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're keeping it under observation until we're fully prepared for our next move.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Kal'tsit has left behind some important information... but my mind is a mess. I need your help.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Of course. But we'll need to get you checked out at the new base first.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is important for your own health, and for the safety of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You'll need to keep a low profile, until we fully understand what's going on with you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right now, there are still a lot of operators hoping that we'll bring Dr. Kal'tsit home.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Give them some time, and give us some time... I'm sorry, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Kal'tsit would have approved of your decision.
attributes.name: Mon3tr
Mon3tr
attributes.content: I will cooperate with you, fullyâ€”

attributes.name: Mon3tr
attributes.content: Say, uh, can I consider myself a Rhodes Island Operator now?
attributes.joined: I will cooperate with you, fullyâ€”Say, uh, can I consider myself a Rhodes Island Operator now?

attributes.content: Just like Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I asked Kal'tsit so many times before, but she kept coming up with excuses to refuse me!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Do you agree with Rhodes Island's ideals?

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Well... I can't say I don't have any misgivings about the present situation, but I've never doubted Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Rhodes Island will never turn away a friend who has always been by our side.

attributes.content: Doctor? Where are you going?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Give the Doctor some space for a while, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So you're sure there are no other issues, Dr. Warfarin?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've conducted a full examination of Mon3tr under her guidance. I didn't find any trace of Priestess's influence.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But Mon3tr and Kal'tsit were always full of secrets. There's a lot of research that I want to tryâ€”
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: (Kal'tsit was never so cooperative with exams!)
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But I have a paper to write.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You're not going to review the information Kal'tsit left with us?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I'd love to, but not now.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This is a moment for Dr. {@nickname} and Amiya to share. I can wait for a better time.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: (Take good care of her, Doctor.)
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: (I was surprised by Mon3tr's frankness when I was with her.)
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: (She may have all of Kal'tsit's memories, but it's hard for me to treat them as the same person.)
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You watch Mon3tr curiously fiddling with the command center equipment, as Amiya explains to her the additions to the newly rebuilt room.
She is very different from Kal'tsit, but they have the same strong, resolute eyes.

attributes.options: We'll take good care of her, Warfarin.

attributes.content: Come find me if you need anything, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Doctor, Amiya said that the command system hasn't been fully restored?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Closure is working on a new PRTS.
But deciphering the PRTS source code has proven to be a challenge.

attributes.content: I can help.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Since Kal'tsit broke through her limit, I am now able to decipher the associated code.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Restoring the command system is a priority for our future operations.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Great! That's one headache gone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll ask Closure to do something about it. For now...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I won't give up on searching for any messages Kal'tsit might have leftâ€”
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: If you've accessed this log, that meansâ€”
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: You are free.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: You are not just 'Kal'tsit's symbiont' anymore. Nor are you a vehicle of the AMa-10 cycle.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: ...Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Chuckling) I wonder what name you will choose.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: Will you keep the name 'Kal'tsit'?
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: I like this name, but it belongs to you.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: ...'Mon3tr'. I choose the name you gave me.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: To be honest, I don't want you to have to carry the burden represented by this name.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: Someone gave me the freedom to seek the meaning of life. You deserve the same chance.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: Go forth and find the meaning of your life. Let your heart answer for yourself your expectations for this landâ€”
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: Is it hope, or destruction?
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: I'm sorry that I can't be with you anymore, until you've found the answer.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: But I have so many questions...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Mon3tr remembers the questions that Warfarin raised to her while examining herâ€”
'Why choose a similar form to Kal'tsit, instead of something more efficient and resilient?'
'Why hide your claws? So that others will not fear you?'
'Why have you chosen to remain human?'
I don't know... I just chose it on instinct.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: There are many answers that come to my lips, but I just can't find the right words...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I can't think like you, Kal'tsit. Too much information, too many memories. My mind is a mess...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I want to find a way to bring you back, butâ€”
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: But you will never doubt your own decision.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: We've walked the centuries together. I know full well that you already know the answer.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: You just need some time to understand yourself.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: Keep moving forward.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: The voice stops.
You and Amiya do not want to disturb.
You can feel Amiya trying to hold her emotions back too.
You step closer to her, to give her comfort.
Doctor, I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...This isâ€”
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: For the Doctor and Amiya?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, Amiya. I tried to envision the circumstances under which you will hear this recording.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: I hope you don't find this bafflingâ€”
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: The destruction of Rhodes Island was not unexpected.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: We face a foe far stronger than any other that we have faced before. I have failed.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: But your war has only just begun.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: Increasingly active Originium will bring new challenges. More pain, more suffering, more hatred, more war...
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: Remember the mission of Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: Gather the strength of the operators scattered across Terra. You will need unity, consolidated force.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: This war is one of all Terra.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.options: She's always been like this...;There's always a Plan B, isn't there?
Is this all she had to say in the end?

attributes.content: Sensing your emotions, Amiya grips your hand.
Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's okay, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If it hurts, say so.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I won't touch your emotions without permission... But I want to share the burden.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Me too... Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I promised Dr. Kal'tsit that I would do my duty and protect the Doctor. I'll do it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This time, I will not cry until Rhodes Island's mission is complete.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I really miss her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The girl does not answer. She is focused on the databank before her, searching for something.
A massive amount of data scrolls before her eyes, and her gaze grows intent.
There's so much...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: She left so much data that I never got to access.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Maybe there's a way... it's possible...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: There is a way, Doctor...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: We can bring Kal'tsit back.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.text: For now, allow me to call you by the name that we chose together, Mon3tr.
People pour love into life and long for salvation whether in hope or fear. That's why they choose to pray to gods that they've never seen...
But how could it come true? Even the most tired river must eventually flow into the ocean.
When the final moment comes, when sun, moon and stars fade... when the swaying waves no longer murmur, when all sound and sights are gone.
When the colors of winter and spring are no more, and the boundary of night and day blursâ€”
And only eternal slumber in endless night remains.
It was a poem that my maker read to me when we were lying upon the frozen earth, both exhausted from playing.
Eternal life is destined to be eternally lonely. I have known how it feels.
I am sure you too can walk aloneâ€”
